# The `VPSingleDefRecipe` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

VPSingleDef is a base class for recipes for modeling a sequence of one or more output IR that define a single result <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpvalue">VPValue</a>. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::VPSingleDefRecipe</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

VPSingleDef is a base class for recipes for modeling a sequence of one or more output IR that define a single result <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpvalue">VPValue</a>.

Note that <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vprecipebase">VPRecipeBase</a> must be inherited from before <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpvalue">VPValue</a>.

Definition at line 838 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplan-h">VPlan.h</a>.
